page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content: The only place of worship in our block is {THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND PARISH {CHURCH OF HOBKIRK.}This is located just outside the village of Bonchester Bridge,not far from the school.The Manse,residence of the Minister,is about 1Km.South-west of the church, further up the Rulewater Valley. The Glebe or church lands lie between the Manse and the schoolhouse.They are currently rented from the church by the owner of Hartshaugh Farm,situated opposite.This church is linked with the one at Southdean,services being held every Sunday morning in alternate weeks.The present church was finished in 1863,although there is known to have been one on the site since 1045. Four church elders assist with the running of the church,and the Minister also attends the school regularly,as school chaplain.
